name: cheatsheet-search
title: Cheatsheet with full text search
description: This extension allows to search through an fulltext index directly from Raycast.
author: TianYongwei

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Cheatsheet
commands.subtitle: Cheatsheet
commands.description: Search through an fulltext index directly from Raycast.

preferences.name: appId
preferences.title: Application ID
preferences.description: You can find your Application ID from the Algolia Dashboard.

preferences.name: indexName
preferences.title: Index Name
preferences.description: Specify the Algolia Index you want to search on.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Search API Key
preferences.description: You can find your Search API Key from the Algolia Dashboard.

preferences.name: mainAttribute
preferences.title: Main Attribute
preferences.description: The main attribute from your records you want to display in search results.

preferences.name: secondaryAttribute
preferences.title: Secondary Attribute
preferences.description: A secondary attribute from your records you want to display in search results (optional).

preferences.name: tertiaryAttribute
preferences.title: Tertiary Attribute
preferences.description: A tertiary attribute from your records you want to display in search results (optional).

preferences.name: urlAttribute
preferences.title: URL Attribute
preferences.description: If your record contains an URL that you'd like to open (optional).
